en.name: Draw Sense: Rank-Up-Magic
en.effect: Can be used before your normal draw after your Life Points decrease by 1500. One of the cards from your normal draw this turn will be a random "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell Card from your Deck.This Skill can only be used once per Duel, and only if you begin the Duel with a Deck that contains at least 3 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell Cards with different names.
